overview: The Tall Man, that imposing menace from Morningside Mortuary, is back and once again haunting the thoughts of the now-adult Mike and his friend, ex-Ice Cream vendor Reggie. The two continue their hunt for the mysterious figure and in his path of destruction encounter a variety of dangerous situations, friends and enemies.
original_title: Phantasm III: Lord of the Dead
tagline: If You Don't Get It This Time, He'll Have To Drill It Into Your Head!
cast: A. Michael Baldwin|Reggie Bannister|Bill Thornbury|Gloria Lynne Henry|Kevin Connors
